maqras.text: Ware wa kono machi ni oite chikau
Anata wa kono machi no (ijuken o motsu) jumindearu
Umu mono to umareru mono ni kakete (chikau)
Hontoni ware wa, ningen o roku suru yo ni tsukutta
Kare (ningen) wa, nanimono mo, jibun o sayu suru mono wa nai to kangaeru no ka
Kare wa,`watashi wa taihen'na zaisan o tsuiyashita.' To iu
Kare wa, dare mo kare o miteinai to kangaeru no ka
Ware wa, kare no tame ni ryome o tsukuttade wanai ka
matahitotsu no shita to futatsu no kuchibiru o
Sarani futatsunomichi o kare ni shimeshita (de wanai ka)
Daga kare wa, kewashi michi o torou to wa shinai
Kewashi michi ga nandearu ka o, anata ni rikai sa seru mono wa nani ka
(Soreha) dorei o kaiho shi
matawa kiga no hi ni wa shokumotsu o dashite
chikai enja no minashigo o
matawa hidoku awarena hinja o (yashinau koto)
Sore kara shinko suru mono ni natte nintai no tame ni hagemashi ai, tagaini shinsetsu, onjo o tsukushi au (kotodearu)
Korera wa migite no nakamadearu
Daga waga shirushi o kyohi suru mono, kare-ra wa hidarite no nakamadearu
Kare-ra no ue ni wa, goka ga oikabusarudearou
Taiyo to sono kagayaki ni oite
sore ni shitagau tsuki ni oite
(taiyo o) kagayaki gen wasu hiru ni oite
sore o ou yoru ni oite
ten to, sore o uchi tateta okata ni oite
daichi to, sore o hirogeta okata ni oite
tamashi to, sore o tsuriai chitsujo tsuketa okata ni oite
jaaku to shinjin ni tsuite, sore (tamashi) ni shisa shita okata ni oite (chikau)
Hontoni sore (tamashi) o kiyomeru mono wa seiko shi
sore o yogosu mono wa horobiru
Samudo (no min) wa, sono hogaina okonai ni yotte (yogen-sha o) uso-tsuki yobawari shita
Kare-ra no naka no mottomo jaaku no mono ga (fushinjin no tame) tachiagatta toki
arra no shito (sarifu) wa kare-ra ni,`arra no mesu 骼駝Dearu. Soreni mizu o noma se nasai.' To itta
Daga kare-ra wa, kare o uso-tsuki-sha to yobi, sono hiza no ken o ki~tsu(te fugu ni shi)ta. Sorede omo wa, sono tsumi no tame ni kare-ra o horoboshi, tairage rareta
Kare wa, sono kekka o koryo sa renai
Owa reru yoru ni oite
kagayaku hiru ni oite
danjo o sozo sa reta okata ni oite (chikau)
Anata gata no doryoku wa, hontoni tayo (na ketsumatsu)dearu
Sore de hodokoshi o nashi,-nushi o osoreru mono
mata shizen o jissho suru mono ni wa
ware wa (shifuku e no michi o) yoi ni shiyou
Daga goyokude, unuborete iru mono
shizen o kyohi suru mono ni wa
ware wa (kunan e no michi o) yoi ni surudearou
Kare ga horobi sarou to suru toki, sono tomi wa kare ni yakudatanaidearou
Hontoni michibiki wa ware ni ari
raise mo gense mo ware ni zokusuru
Sorede ware wa moesakaru goka ni tsuite anata gata ni keikoku shita
Mottomo fukona monodenai kagiri, dare mo sore de yaka renai
Soreha (shinri o) usodearu to ii somuki satta-sha
Daga (omo no tame ni) chusei no kagiri o tsukushita mono wa, sorekara sukuwa re
sono tomi o hodokoshi, jibun o kiyomeru
Mata dareka-ra mo, jihi no hoshu o motomenai
Isshokenmei ni shikosha,-nushi no mikao o kou dakedearu
Yagate, kare wa (jubun ni) manzoku dekirudearou
Asa (no kagayaki) ni oite
seijakuna yoru ni oite (chikau)
Omo wa, anata o misute rarezu, nikuma reta wakede mo nai
Hontoni raise (shorai) wa, anata ni totte utsushiyo (genzai) yori, motto yoi nodearu
Yagate omo wa anata no manzoku suru mono o o sazuke ni naru
Kare wa minashigo no anata o mitsuke rare, higo nasa retade wanai ka
Kare wa samayotte ita anata o mitsukete, michibiki o atae
Mata mazushi anata o mitsukete, yufuku ni nasa retade wanai ka
Dakara minashigo o shitagete wa naranai
Kou mono o 揆 Ne tsukete wa naranai
Anata no omo no onkei o nobetsutaeru ga i
